body.name: Diver Nylon Small Womens Crossbody Bag Purse with Adjustable Shoulder Strap
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 34 mins
features: Nautica cross body purse for women - Each cross body bag includes, 1 exterior zippered pocket, 1 interior zippered pocket, 2 slip pockets perfect for your smart phone and adjustable shoulder strap
Cross body travel bag FOR women - the perfect travel accessory for any women, keep your valuable items close and looking stylish with a Nautica women's cross body bag

Durable Lightweight nylon material - With a clean and stylish look that matches the Nautica brand, our cross body purse is the perfect bag for any occasion and with its nylon material it makes cleaning super easy and very lightweight
Perfect SIZE - Not too big and not to small this flat cross body purse can carry all your essential items without. Size: 8.5 x 9 x 1.75 inches
body.description: Perfectly SIZED for the busy woman on the run, The Nautica DIVER nylon cross body bag gives you everything you're looking for in a small yet practical daily purse. It is a practical and lightweight bag that lets you to keep your valuable items close by, safe and secure. Our cross body bag for women is the perfect travel accessory for any lady who is searching for a small, lightweight, and stylish purse. The exterior of this elegantly designed purse features decorative mesh, to give this bag a trendy and playful look. It comes with plenty of pockets and storage room, which allows you to keep your essential items secure. Nautica is a brand you can trust, mainly due to the superior materials we use in the construction of our products. Our nylon & rip-stop materials make clean-up simple, allowing you to maintain a fresh-appearing cross body purse always. The fun and friendly prints are visually pleasing, and our high-quality manufacturing standards ensure durability. While this Nautica lakeside signature jacquard women's cross body bag is incredibly durable, it's made from lightweight materials, making it weigh only 6.4 ounces. It's a smaller cross body purse, but it has lots of storage space, given its 8.5 x 9 x 1.75 Measurements. We take pride in making elegant-appearing yet exceptionally functional women's cross body bags. This bag is lightweight, fashionable, and easy to clean. It can be used as a daily shoulder bag or a travel bag to anywhere you're headed. Nautica women's cross body bags are easy to use and are offered in a variety of solid colors and prints.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Collection Of Nautica Bags And Fashion Accessories Perfect For All Occasions Backpacks If you want fashion, function or versatility, Nautica has an amazing collection of backpacks for all occasion. Explore our small fashion backpacks perfect for walking around town or our large backpacks ideal for day trips. Totes & Shoulder Bags Looking for a beautiful and functional tote or shoulder bag? Explore our collection of bags below and find the perfect one that fits your style. Our bags are versatility and can transition from going to the office and for a weekend trip. Crossbody Bags & Wallets Take on your day hands free with one of our sporty and elegant crossbody bags and purses. We offer small RFID blocking bags that are great for walking around. We also have larger purses that will hold all of your personal items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Functional Crossbody Bag for Everyday Use
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Nautica Diver Nylon Small Women's Crossbody Bag Purse with Adjustable Shoulder Strap, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in terms of both style and functionality.First and foremost, the design of this bag is sleek and modern. The combination of nylon material and the Nautica logo adds a touch of sophistication, making it suitable for various occasions. Whether I'm running errands or going out for a casual outing, this bag effortlessly complements my outfit.The size of the bag is perfect for my needs. It is compact enough to carry the essentials, such as my phone, wallet, keys, and a few small personal items, without feeling bulky or cumbersome. The multiple compartments and pockets provide convenient organization, allowing me to easily access my belongings.One of the standout features of this bag is the adjustable shoulder strap. It allows me to customize the length to my preference, ensuring a comfortable fit. The strap is also sturdy and well-made, providing added durability and peace of mind.The quality of the materials used in this bag is impressive. The nylon fabric is not only lightweight but also water-resistant, making it suitable for everyday use and protecting my belongings from unexpected spills or light rain.I also appreciate the attention to detail in the construction of this bag. The stitching is neat and secure, ensuring long-lasting durability. The zippers are smooth and easy to operate, adding to the overall convenience.In terms of functionality, this crossbody bag delivers. It keeps my belongings organized and easily accessible, while the hands-free design allows me to go about my day with ease. Whether I'm shopping or traveling, this bag has become my go-to companion.Overall, I highly recommend the Nautica Diver Nylon Small Women's Crossbody Bag Purse with Adjustable Shoulder Strap. Its stylish design, practical features, and quality craftsmanship make it a reliable and fashionable choice for anyone in need of a versatile and functional crossbody bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Everyday Bag
reviews.reviewText: At first this bag seemed too small for my needs but quickly became my everyday bag. Its very lightweight and waterproof with an adjustable strap. If you utilize the extra front pocket and the interior pouch/pocket areas you really can carry all your essential needs. From doing so my bag is always organized as well. Have recommended this bag to friends and it comes in many colors. I ordered the Navy and love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for my daughter and she absolutely loves it. Very classy and easy to clean. Perfect size for wallet, phone and great zipper pocket inside and out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient but small.
reviews.reviewText: This is a bit smaller than I would like. Fits well and I like the pockets. I just need it to hold more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality, perfect size, bought to go with my Croc Crush pink boots !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for trips. Bright color and great quality
reviews.reviewText: Great quality and gorgeous pink. I love everything pink so it was amazing. Very good teen bag or a great mom bag. I have to keep getting it away from my teen. Lol. She loves it as well. But so worth the buy. I'll be getting her one for her birthday. Great for trips as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice compact bag
reviews.reviewText: This small bag is perfect size for my daily walks. I can fit everything I need inside. The material feels water resistant and the multiple compartments are great for separating my contents.My only issue is the fact that the adjustable strap dies NOT stay secure. There is NO locking mechanism so when walking it can change lengths. I'm using various methods to secure (paper clip, binder clip, etc) but this messes with clean lines and functionality of bag. Too bad makers did not see fit to address this issue.This is a nearly perfect little bag but not quite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best size ever!!!
reviews.reviewText: I loved the material and the size. Ideal for daily use. You can also adjust the strap depending on how you want to wear it.
Buen tamaño, muchos bolsillos, muy buena calidad, fácil de limpiar.Lindo estilo, correa ajustable.Vale la pena!
good size not too big and not too small. enough to carry my day to day items. seems to be sturdy and well made.
La tengo en casi todos los colores! El único pero que tiene es que con peso la correa se mueve, pero no por eso dejan de ser hermosas!

This purse is fabulous! It’s small enough for events but large enough to carry all the essentials. It’s great for hiking, shopping, festivals, etc. I carry mine everywhere. It’s sturdy but looks stylish. The adjustable strap allows for comfortable crossbody wear. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great material. I love this brand. Very good quality workmanship, beautiful range of colours. I got a red one to go with my red shoes when I wear them. I need another one for a different outfit. Just wish they did a slightly larger size. But still 5 stars, because I knew what the size was going to be when I bought it.
